articles.description: Idris Elba and Stranger Things’ Caleb McLaughlin star in Concrete Cowboy, a family drama that sends a troubled Detroit teenager to North Philadelphia to join a modern community of Black cowboys. Inspired by the real-life Fletcher Street Stables, and adapted f…
articles.content: The common narrative of inner-city life, both in Hollywood films and American pop culture as a whole, usually plays out predictably: absentee father, mother on welfare, children turning to drug-deali… [+5487 chars]
